name: miso.distil
body:
# To update the DISTIL feature just add this link to your "install new software" option in Eclipse

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carras91/miso.distil/master/updateSite/site.xml

# JavaDoc

[Go to DISTIL.CloudModelServices Java Doc](http://carras91.github.io/miso.distil/doc/cloudModelServices/index.html)

[Go to DISTIL.CodeGenerator Java Doc](http://carras91.github.io/miso.distil/doc/codeGenerator/index.html)

MetaModel of DISTIL language:

![DISTIL MetaModel](http://s2.subirimagenes.com/imagen/previo/thump_9428671metamodel.png)

# Examples
[Go to Bento web site](https://miso-distil-bento.herokuapp.com/)
[Go to Bento  Java Doc](http://carras91.github.io/miso.distil/doc/bento/index.html)
[Go to File Server web site](https://miso-distil-fileserver.herokuapp.com/)
[Go to Bento  Java Doc](http://carras91.github.io/miso.distil/doc/filserver/index.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
